page.description: Select every Nth record in the table in the current sort order.
page.syntax: Filter_Expression as C = sample_records(sample as n[,filter as c])

argument.name: sample
argument.description: The interval between sampled records. Numeric

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records from the table. Character

page.discussion: SAMPLE_RECORDS() is a special function used only in queries to return Every Nth record in a table. If the optional filter is supplied, only the records selected by the filter are sampled.

section.title: Example
section.description: See Top, Bottom, Nth Record and Random Record Queries for more information. The following query returns every 10th order placed after May 1, 2000.
section.example: t = table.current() query.filter = "sample_records(10, \"orderdate > {5/1/2000}\")" query.order = "order_total" i = t.query_create() topparent.resynch()
